resources.string: "Straw Hat Luffy" Monky D. Luffy - The captain of Straw Hat Pirates and the next pirate king
"Pirate Hunter Zoro" Zoro - One of the best swordsmans
"Cat Burglar" Nami - The navigator of Straw Hat Pirates
Brook - the musician of Starw Hat Pirates
"Lair" Usopp - Former captain of Usopp Pirates, now a sniper of Straw Hat Pirates
Nico Robin - Archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates
"Chopper" Tony Tony Chopper - Doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates
"Pervert" Franky - Shipwright for the Straw Hat Pirates
